bookTitle: Artificial Intelligence and Architecture: From Research to Practice
author: Stanislas Chaillou
description: This comprehensive book examines the transformative role of artificial intelligence in modern architecture. It discusses how AI tools are integrated into the design and execution of architectural projects, reshaping everything from conceptual design to construction processes, ultimately leading to more innovative and efficient workflows. This book is a must-read for professionals and students aiming to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of AI and architecture.

bookTitle: Artificial Intelligence in Architecture: Innovations for Future Urban Design
author: Vivek Bhati
description: Focused on the future of urban design, this book provides insight into how AI is driving innovations in city planning. It offers a visionary perspective on the integration of AI in creating smart cities, ensuring sustainable, intelligent, and efficient designs that meet the evolving needs of modern urban environments. This book is a must-read for professionals and students aiming to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of AI and architecture.

bookTitle: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach - Paperback
author: Stuart Russell
description: Widely regarded as the authoritative text in the AI field, this book covers foundational concepts as well as the latest advancements. It spans various applications of AI, making it indispensable for students and professionals seeking a deep understanding of artificial intelligence and its cross-disciplinary applications. This book is a must-read for professionals and students aiming to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of AI and architecture.
